click.description: Execute a click interaction in a specific browser window.

props.name: elementDescription
props.description: Describe the element to click (e.g. "Login button").

props.name: clientRequestId
props.description: Optional ID to track this request.

props.name: clickType
props.description: The type of click to perform (default: left click).

props.name: scrollWithin
props.description: Describe the scrollable area to search within (e.g. "main content area").

props.name: analysisScope
props.description: Controls how much of the page is visually analyzed (default: auto).

props.name: resultSelectionStrategy
props.description: How to select from multiple matches (default: auto).

props.name: partitionDirection
props.description: How to partition screenshots for analysis (default: vertical).

props.name: maxScanScrolls
props.description: Maximum number of scrolls in scan mode (default: 50).

props.name: scanScrollDelay
props.description: Delay between scrolls in scan mode (default: 1000ms).

props.name: overlapPercentage
props.description: Percentage of overlap between screenshot chunks (default: 30).

props.name: waitForNavigation
props.description: Wait for page navigation to complete after clicking (default: false).

props.name: navigationWaitUntil
props.description: When to consider navigation complete (default: load).

props.name: navigationTimeoutSeconds
props.description: Max seconds to wait for navigation (default: 30).

props.name: costThresholdCredits
props.description: Abort if the credit cost exceeds this amount. Set to 0 to disable.

props.name: timeThresholdSeconds
props.description: Abort if the operation takes longer than this. Set to 0 to disable.

create-browser-window.description: Opens a new window within a session, optionally navigating to a URL.

props.name: url
props.description: URL to open in the new window. Default: https://www.google.com

props.name: screenResolution
props.description: Fixed dimensions for the browser window. Affects live view size.

props.name: customResolution
props.description: Custom resolution in format "widthxheight" (e.g., "1440x900"). Leave blank to use selected resolution above.

props.name: waitUntil
props.description: When to consider the page loaded. Default: load

props.name: waitUntilTimeoutSeconds
props.description: Maximum time to wait for page loading. Default: 30 seconds

create-session.description: Starts a new browser session in Airtop.

props.name: profileName
props.description: Name of a profile to load into the session.

props.name: extensionIds
props.description: List of Chrome extension IDs from Google Web Store.

props.name: useAirtopProxy
props.description: Enable Airtop-provided proxy. If disabled, configure a custom proxy.

props.name: proxyConfig
props.description: Choose how to configure your proxy settings

props.name: proxyType
props.description: Choose how to configure your proxy settings

props.name: proxyUrl
props.description: The proxy URL (e.g., http://proxy.example.com:8080)

props.name: proxyAdvanced
props.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (e.g., "US", "GB"). Use "global" for random countries.

props.name: proxyCountry
props.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (e.g., "US", "GB"). Use "global" for random countries.

props.name: proxySticky
props.description: Try to maintain the same IP address for up to 30 minutes

props.name: proxyUsername
props.description: Username for proxy authentication

props.name: proxyPassword
props.description: Password for proxy authentication

props.name: proxyList
props.description: Configure multiple proxies with domain patterns

props.name: domainPattern
props.description: Domain pattern (e.g., "*.example.com"). Use ? for single character, * for multiple.

props.name: relayUrl
props.description: Proxy URL for this domain pattern

props.name: solveCaptcha
props.description: Automatically solve captcha challenges.

props.name: timeoutMinutes
props.description: How long before the session times out due to inactivity (1-10080 minutes). Default: 10.

hover-element.description: Moves mouse pointer over an element in the browser window.

props.name: elementDescription
props.description: Describe the element to hover, e.g. "the search box input in the top right corner".

props.name: clientRequestId
props.description: Optional ID to track this request.

props.name: scrollWithin
props.description: Describe the scrollable area to search within (e.g. "main content area").

props.name: analysisScope
props.description: Controls how much of the page is visually analyzed (default: auto).

props.name: resultSelectionStrategy
props.description: How to select from multiple matches (default: auto).

props.name: partitionDirection
props.description: How to partition screenshots for analysis (default: vertical).

props.name: maxScanScrolls
props.description: Maximum number of scrolls in scan mode (default: 50).

props.name: scanScrollDelay
props.description: Delay between scrolls in scan mode (default: 1000ms).

props.name: overlapPercentage
props.description: Percentage of overlap between screenshot chunks (default: 30).

props.name: waitForNavigation
props.description: Wait for page navigation to complete after hovering (default: false).

props.name: navigationWaitUntil
props.description: When to consider navigation complete (default: load).

props.name: navigationTimeoutSeconds
props.description: Max seconds to wait for navigation (default: 30).

props.name: costThresholdCredits
props.description: Abort if the credit cost exceeds this amount. Set to 0 to disable.

props.name: timeThresholdSeconds
props.description: Abort if the operation takes longer than this. Set to 0 to disable.

page-query.description: Query a page to extract data or ask a question given the data on the page.

props.name: prompt
props.description: The question or instruction for Airtop to answer about the current page.

props.name: clientRequestId
props.description: An optional ID for your internal tracking.

props.name: outputSchema
props.description: JSON schema defining the structure of the output. Must be valid JSON schema format.

props.name: includeVisualAnalysis
props.description: Whether to include visual analysis of the page (default: auto)

props.name: optimizeUrls
props.description: Improve scraping performance by optimizing URLs (default: auto)

props.name: costThresholdCredits
props.description: Abort if the credit cost exceeds this amount. Set to 0 to disable.

props.name: timeThresholdSeconds
props.description: Abort if the operation takes longer than this. Set to 0 to disable.

props.name: followPaginationLinks
props.description: If enabled, Airtop will attempt to load more content from pagination, scrolling, etc. (default: false)

paginated-extraction.description: Extract content from paginated or dynamically loaded pages.

props.name: prompt
props.description: Instructions on what to extract and how to paginate (e.g. "Navigate through 3 pages and extract titles and prices").

props.name: clientRequestId
props.description: Optional ID to track this request.

props.name: outputSchema
props.description: JSON schema defining the structure of the output. Must be valid JSON schema format.

props.name: scrollWithin
props.description: Describe the scrollable area (e.g. "results container in middle of page").

props.name: paginationMode
props.description: Choose how to navigate through pages (default: auto)

props.name: interactionMode
props.description: Balance between speed and accuracy (default: auto)

props.name: optimizeUrls
props.description: Improve scraping performance by optimizing URLs (default: auto)

props.name: costThresholdCredits
props.description: Abort if the credit cost exceeds this amount. Set to 0 to disable.

props.name: timeThresholdSeconds
props.description: Abort if the operation takes longer than this. Set to 0 to disable.

smart-scrape.description: Scrape a page and return the data as Markdown.

props.name: clientRequestId
props.description: Optional ID to track this request on your end.

props.name: costThresholdCredits
props.description: Abort if the credit cost exceeds this amount. Set to 0 to disable.

props.name: timeThresholdSeconds
props.description: Abort if the operation takes longer than this. Set to 0 to disable.

take-screenshot.description: Captures a screenshot of the current window.

props.name: clientRequestId
props.description: Optional ID for tracking this request

props.name: format
props.description: How to return the screenshot. Default: base64 for viewport, url for page/scan

props.name: scope
props.description: What part of the page to capture. Default: auto

props.name: maxHeight
props.description: Maximum height of screenshot. Will scale down if needed, preserving aspect ratio.

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: Maximum width of screenshot. Will scale down if needed, preserving aspect ratio.

props.name: quality
props.description: Image quality for JPEG compression. Higher = better quality. Note: Feature in development.

props.name: enableVisualAnalysis
props.description: Enable advanced visual analysis features for better page processing

props.name: visualAnalysisConfig
props.description: Override main scope setting for visual analysis. Default: auto

props.name: analysisScope
props.description: Override main scope setting for visual analysis. Default: auto

props.name: partitionDirection
props.description: How to split the screenshot into chunks. Default: vertical

props.name: resultSelectionStrategy
props.description: How to select the best match when multiple results found. Default: auto

props.name: maxScanScrolls
props.description: Maximum number of scrolls in scan mode. Default: 50

props.name: overlapPercentage
props.description: Percentage of overlap between screenshot chunks. Default: 30

props.name: scanScrollDelay
props.description: Delay between scrolls in scan mode. Default: 1000ms

props.name: costThresholdCredits
props.description: Stop screenshot if it costs more than this. Leave blank for default limit.

props.name: timeThresholdSeconds
props.description: Stop screenshot if it takes longer than this. Leave blank for default timeout.

terminate-session.description: Ends an existing browser session in Airtop.

type.description: Type into a browser window at the specified field.

props.name: text
props.description: The text to type into the browser window.

props.name: elementDescription
props.description: Describe the element (e.g., "search box", "username field").

props.name: clearInputField
props.description: Clear the input field before typing text.

props.name: pressEnterKey
props.description: Press Enter key after typing text.

props.name: pressTabKey
props.description: Press Tab key after typing text (after Enter if both enabled).

props.name: waitForNavigation
props.description: Wait for page navigation to complete after typing (default: false).

props.name: navigationTimeoutSeconds
props.description: Max time to wait for navigation after typing (default: 30).

props.name: navigationWaitUntil
props.description: Condition to consider navigation complete (default: load).

props.name: analysisScope
props.description: Controls how much of the page is analyzed to find the input (default: auto).

props.name: visualAnalysisMaxScrolls
props.description: Maximum number of scrolls in scan mode (default: 50).

props.name: visualAnalysisOverlap
props.description: Percentage of overlap between visual chunks (default: 30).

props.name: visualAnalysisDirection
props.description: Direction to partition screenshots (default: vertical).

props.name: visualAnalysisStrategy
props.description: How to select from multiple matches (default: auto).

props.name: visualAnalysisScrollDelay
props.description: Delay between scrolls in scan mode (default: 1000ms).

props.name: scrollWithin
props.description: Describe the scrollable container (e.g., "table body", "product list").

props.name: clientRequestId
props.description: Optional request ID for traceability.

props.name: costThresholdCredits
props.description: Cancel if this limit is exceeded. Set 0 to disable.

props.name: timeThresholdSeconds
props.description: Cancel if exceeded. Set 0 to disable.

upload-file-to-session.description: Push an existing file to one or more sessions, making it available for use in file inputs or downloads.

props.name: sessionIds
props.description: Select one or more sessions to make the file available on. Leave empty to make available to all sessions.
